description.raw:
1. Suppress warnings in external headers:

    * deps/opende/OPCODE/Opcode.h
    * gazebo/gui/qtpropertybrowser/qtpropertybrowserutils.cpp
    * gazebo/gui/qtpropertybrowser/qttreepropertybrowser.cpp
    * gazebo/rendering/skyx/include/Prerequisites.h

1. Similar to 1, create ffmpeg_inc.h with `#pragma clang system_header` to prevent ffmpeg warnings

    * gazebo/common/AudioDecoder.cc
    * gazebo/common/AudioDecoder_TEST.cc
    * gazebo/common/CommonIface.cc
    * gazebo/common/Video.cc

1. Unused variables

    * gazebo/Server.hh
    * gazebo/gui/*Maker.cc
    * gazebo/rendering/OrbitViewController.hh
    * plugins/DiffDrivePlugin.hh

1. Suppress warnings about overloaded virtual. The warning occurs because we're using our own SM2Profile class instead of `OGRE::SM2Profile`.

    * gazebo/rendering/Heightmap.hh

1. Rename function to avoid overloaded virtual warning.

    * test/integration/pr2.cc

1. Unused function arguments when CEGUI is not installed.

    * gazebo/rendering/GUIOverlay.hh

1. Fixed casting from double to int in Time_TEST, assuming that we wanted to test the Time constructor that takes a double as input (just one argument).

    * gazebo/common/Time_TEST.cc

1. Wrap `#define SIZE_MAX` in `#ifndef`

    * deps/opende/src/util.h
description.html:
1. Suppress warnings in external headers:

    • deps/opende/OPCODE/Opcode.h
    • gazebo/gui/qtpropertybrowser/qtpropertybrowserutils.cpp
    • gazebo/gui/qtpropertybrowser/qttreepropertybrowser.cpp
    • gazebo/rendering/skyx/include/Prerequisites.h

  2. Similar to 1, create ffmpeg_inc.h with #pragma clang system_header to prevent ffmpeg warnings

    • gazebo/common/AudioDecoder.cc
    • gazebo/common/AudioDecoder_TEST.cc
    • gazebo/common/CommonIface.cc
    • gazebo/common/Video.cc

  3. Unused variables

    • gazebo/Server.hh
    • gazebo/gui/*Maker.cc
    • gazebo/rendering/OrbitViewController.hh
    • plugins/DiffDrivePlugin.hh

  4. Suppress warnings about overloaded virtual. The warning occurs because we're using our own SM2Profile class instead of OGRE::SM2Profile.

    • gazebo/rendering/Heightmap.hh

  5. Rename function to avoid overloaded virtual warning.

    • test/integration/pr2.cc

  6. Unused function arguments when CEGUI is not installed.

    • gazebo/rendering/GUIOverlay.hh

  7. Fixed casting from double to int in Time_TEST, assuming that we wanted to test the Time constructor that takes a double as input (just one argument).

    • gazebo/common/Time_TEST.cc

  8. Wrap #define SIZE_MAX in #ifndef

    • deps/opende/src/util.h
